T02D1711:72a-1: ao dyan ka ma t'a re de b'i s'a dha nam n'a ma /
T02D1711:72a-3: au rgyan gyi rim pa'i sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba /
T02D1711:72a-4: bcom ldan 'das ma lha mo 'phags ma sgrol ma
T02D1711:72a-5: gnas chen gyi dbang phyug ma la phyag 'tshal lo
T02D1711:72a-6: // gsang ba'i rgyud du rdo rje'i tshig 'di gsungs //
T02D1711:72a-7: de kho na nyid rtogs dka' man ngag 'di //
T02D1711:72a-8: spros pa dang bral rnam par rtog med las //
T02D1711:72a-9: dang po nyid rjes langs te bshad par bya //
T02D1711:72a-10: nyam nga spangs pa'i sems kyis sa gzhir bris //
T02D1711:72a-11: mandala byas te bdud rtsi lngas gang ba'i //
T02D1711:72a-12: thod pha rlung mes dag bsgom bdud rtsi 'bar ba yis //
T02D1711:72a-13: lus la khyab byugs phyi nang dag byas nas //
T02D1711:72a-14: 'bol ba'i stan la rdo rje skyil krung dang //
T02D1711:72a-15: ye shes phyag rgyas brtan pas rab 'dug nas //
T02D1711:72a-16: stong kyang snang ba'i 'gro gsum thams cad la //
T02D1711:72a-17: rmi lam sgyu ma dri za'i grong 'drar blta //
T02D1711:72a-18: snying nang mkha' dbus ye shes dri bral ba'i //
T02D1711:72a-19: zla ba'i steng du t'am yig 'od zer lnga //
T02D1711:72a-20: 'bar ba 'phros te phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dang //
T02D1711:72a-21: sgrol ma dang bcas thams cad grub pa rnams //
T02D1711:72a-22: kun nas ye shes sku can dran par bya //
T02D1711:72a-23: ye shes 'od zer dag gi phyogs bcu yi //
T02D1711:72a-24: sems can thams cad bla med byang chub ni //
T02D1711:72a-25: sangs rgyas la rab bkod mkha' dbyings dang //
T02D1711:72a-26: 'gro ba thams cad sgrol mar rab bltas te //
T02D1711:72a-27: ye shes mchod pas sna tshogs gnyis med mchod //
T02D1711:72a-28: dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su mchi ba dang //
T02D1711:72a-29: sems can kun gyi don byas gsum po yis //
T02D1711:72a-30: dbye bas mi shes dang bcas sdig pa bshags //
T02D1711:72a-31: sdig las rnam grol myur du sangs rgyas shog / bdag nyid 'gro ba sangs rgyas sgrol ma dang //
T02D1711:72a-32: snang ba'i yul rnams thams cad sgrol mar bya //
T02D1711:72a-33: rnam par rtog pa ma lus bcom pa yis //
T02D1711:72a-34: chos rnams rang bzhin stong zhing bdag med do //
T02D1711:72a-35: aom sh'u n+ya t'a dzny'a na badzra sv'a bh'a ba a'atma konyaham /
T02D1711:72a-36: nam mkha'i khams su zla ba'i dbus gnas pa'i //
T02D1711:72a-37: de la stong pa'i ye shes kyis mnan pa //
T02D1711:72a-38: zla pa'i dbus su t'am gi yi ge las //
T02D1711:72b-0: @72b rdo rje rlung me g-yo ba'i rnam dag pa'i //
T02D1711:72b-1: ye shes byin brlabs sangs rgyas kun zhing gi / rnal 'byor rnal 'byor ma dang de bzhin gshegs //
T02D1711:72b-2: byang sems mgon po kun nas g-yo ba yi //
T02D1711:72b-3: ye shes rlung gi gnyis med yi ge la //
T02D1711:72b-4: thim pas ye shes ma lus thams cad mkhyen //
T02D1711:72b-5: de khengs 'dres las gyur pas bdag nyid dang //
T02D1711:72b-6: 'gro ba mtha' dag sgrol ma'i skur bskyed de //
T02D1711:72b-7: dmar dang sngon po ljang gu cung zad khro //
T02D1711:72b-8: dpa' bo zhi ba ser po steng gi zhal //
T02D1711:72b-9: thod pa'i phreng bas dbu brgyan ye shes lnga //
T02D1711:72b-10: rgyan rnams ma lus thams cad brgyan pa yi ;
T02D1711:72b-11: / rdo rje ral gri autpala rin po che //
T02D1711:72b-12: thod pa kha tv'am dril bu da ma ru //
T02D1711:72b-13: 'dzin cing bde ba'i ye shes 'bras bu 'byung //
T02D1711:72b-14: stag lpags sham thabs phyed krung gar gyis gnas //
T02D1711:72b-15: sna tshogs pad zla'i dkyil brtan snying rje khros //
T02D1711:72b-16: spyan gsum dmar pas kun la gzigs g-yon du //
T02D1711:72b-17: blta zhing rlung gi dkyil 'khor la gnas pa //
T02D1711:72b-18: zhing du spros pa mchog gi rnal 'byor ma tshogs dbus //
T02D1711:72b-19: 'jug cing bde ba thams cad rab ster bzhugs //
T02D1711:72b-20: pu dz'a ao aa go r'a de m'a k'a ao
T02D1711:72b-21: tri ko ka la k'a hi pre gri soo su
T02D1711:72b-22: n'a sim ku / yi ge nyi shu rtsa bzhi 'di dag kyang //
T02D1711:72b-23: rnal 'byor ma gnas 'khor lo lus la dgod //
T02D1711:72b-24: rnal 'byor ma yi dbang phyug rab tu bsgrub //
T02D1711:72b-25: spyi bo spyi gtsug rna g-yon ltag khung du //
T02D1711:72b-26: rna g-yas smin mtshams mig dang lag gnyis la //
T02D1711:72b-27: de bzhin mchan khung gnyis gnas nu ma gnyis //
T02D1711:72b-28: lte ba sna rtse kha mgrin snying ga rnams //
T02D1711:72b-29: pho kha gsang gnas bshang lam de bzhin bral //
T02D1711:72b-30: rje ngar bo la gong rkang mthil rkang sor dang //
T02D1711:72b-31: pus mo rim bzhin 'di dag lus la dgod //
T02D1711:72b-32: de nas lha yi rim pa dgod par bya //
T02D1711:72b-33: dang po lha mo su ra te shva ri /
T02D1711:72b-34: gnyis pa su ra ta santo ri /
T02D1711:72b-35: gsum pa su ra ta tsandra /
T02D1711:72b-36: bzhi pa su ra ta ma li ni /
T02D1711:72b-37: lnga pa su ra ta bhakshi dang /
T02D1711:72b-38: drug pa su ra ta ka mi ni /
T02D1711:72b-39: bdun pa su ra ta au gra dang /
T02D1711:72b-40: brgyad pa su ra ta autta ma //
T02D1711:72b-41: gnas dang nye ba'i gnas nas lha mo bsgom //
T02D1711:72b-42: rnal 'byor ma yi dbang phyug rab tu bde //
T02D1711:72b-43: dkar po ljang gu sdo ser kha dog bzhi //
T02D1711:73a-0: @73a * // ser dkar dmar sngo kha dog de brgyad do //
T02D1711:73a-1: thod pa kha tv'am dril bu da ma ru //
T02D1711:73a-2: phyogs 'dzin brgyad po thod pa'i phreng ba dang //
T02D1711:73a-3: rgyan rnams thams cad kyis brgyan khro bo yi //
T02D1711:73a-4: shi kshe bhi ma shi khand'i dang bcas //
T02D1711:73a-5: ke r'a li dza tra l'i de bzhin du //
T02D1711:73a-6: au dra dzo tr'i de bzhin tsandri dang //
T02D1711:73a-7: moondi bi ka ta autka ste bcas //
T02D1711:73a-8: ki ri ti na rta ki kam pu dz'i //
T02D1711:73a-9: pukka s'i dombi n'i ma tam ge ni //
T02D1711:73a-10: yongs bskor 'di dag zhing dang nye ba'i zhing //
T02D1711:73a-11: tshando nye ba'i tshando 'du ba nye 'du ba //
T02D1711:73a-12: dur khrod nye ba'i dur khrod lha mo ni //
T02D1711:73a-13: bcu gnyis phyed dmar phyed ljang thod phreng gis ;
T02D1711:73a-14: / dbu rgyan sna tshogs rgyan ldan skra grol ba //
T02D1711:73a-15: cung zad bsgyings shing cod pan rnam snang ldan //
T02D1711:73a-16: thod pa kha tv'am 'khor lo rdo rje bsnams //
T02D1711:73a-17: sgo skyong bzhi ni sna tshogs mdog can la //
T02D1711:73a-18: mche ba gtsigs shing g-yas brkyang g-yon bskum bzhugs //
T02D1711:73a-19: sna tshogs padma nyi ma'i steng dbus na //
T02D1711:73a-20: mi bskyod pa yi dam tshig thor tshugs brgyan //
T02D1711:73a-21: thod pa kha tv'am gri gug mi mgo 'dzin //
T02D1711:73a-22: sbrul gyi rgyan can bdud bzhi'i steng gnas pa //
T02D1711:73a-23: thams cad phyogs kyi gos can snying rje yis //
T02D1711:73a-24: dag pa bde ldan rin chen ye shes kyis //
T02D1711:73a-25: bdag pos spyi bor spras pa rnam par brgyan //
T02D1711:73a-26: bde chen dbang phyug lte ba'i dbus bzhugs pa'i //
T02D1711:73a-27: bzang zhing che ba'i sgrol ma rnal 'byor ma //
T02D1711:73a-28: dga' bde'i dbang phyug ma kun 'dab ma la //
T02D1711:73a-29: g-yon skor g-yas skor dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma'i //
T02D1711:73a-30: 'gro ba'i bdag mo'i 'khor lo mang ngo ni //
T02D1711:73a-31: shi kshe nas bzung tsandra mtha' ma ni //
T02D1711:73a-32: nirti rkang stabs gar gyis bskor ba'o //
T02D1711:73a-33: sgo bzhi kam bu la sogs g-yon skor gnas //
T02D1711:73a-34: spyi bo snying ga lte ba gsang ba brla //
T02D1711:73a-35: pus mo'i rim bzhin rang gi mtshan ma'i dbus //
T02D1711:73a-36: shin tu bzang ba ye shes lnga yi rigs//
T02D1711:73a-37: lus la dgod pa brum h'um a'am tr'am kham //
T02D1711:73a-38: rdo rje padma 'khor lo la sogs dbus //
T02D1711:73a-39: sems la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid bkod nas ni //
T02D1711:73a-40: ye shes 'od zer gyis ni 'khor lo dgug / mnyam pa'i sems kyis mchod yon la sogs dang //
T02D1711:73a-41: ye shes bdud rtsi lnga yi mchod yon gyis //
T02D1711:73b-0: @73b mchod cing bstod nas ye shes bdag la zhugs //
T02D1711:73b-1: rang gi spros nas ye shes chu rgyun gyis //
T02D1711:73b-2: dbang bskur shin tu spros shing ye shes kyis //
T02D1711:73b-3: mchod pa spros nas sangs rgyas rnal 'byor pa //
T02D1711:73b-4: sems can mtha' dag sgrol ma'i gzugs su mthong //
T02D1711:73b-5: bsgom par bya ba'i rnal 'byor ma yi bsgom pa yi //
T02D1711:73b-6: ngo bo mchog gi de nyid zhing rnams rim pa ltar //
T02D1711:73b-7: rnal 'byor ma yi man ngag dam tshig rim //
T02D1711:73b-8: bla ma'i rjes 'brangs bdag gis thob pa'o //
T02D1711:73b-9: bla ma'i zhabs kyi bka' drin las rtogs pa //
T02D1711:73b-10: ye shes rtogs pa'i bdag nyid ngo bos rtogs //
T02D1711:73b-11: ye shes rtogs pa'i dri bral ye shes med //
T02D1711:73b-12: rtog med chos kyi bdag med mnyam pa nyid //
T02D1711:73b-13: kha dog dbyibs dang yi ge rang bzhin med //
T02D1711:73b-14: ring med chos rnams kun gyi de kho na //
T02D1711:73b-15: mchog gi dkyil 'khor rnal 'byor ye shes gnas //
T02D1711:73b-16: de kho na yi bzlas pa mchog gi mchog / de ni rnal 'byor dbang phyug rab tu bsgrub //
T02D1711:73b-17: bdag gi de nyid bzang po rab grub pa'i //
T02D1711:73b-18: rnal 'byor ma yi dkyil 'khor 'di dag gi / ming gi yi ge dbus gnas thams cad la //
T02D1711:73b-19: dang po'i sa bon dang sbyar mtha' ma ru //
T02D1711:73b-20: h'um phat sbyar bas sgo bzhi'i lha mo bsdus //
T02D1711:73b-21: de steng dza:h'um bam ho:sbyar ba yis //
T02D1711:73b-22: dus rnams kun tu rnal 'byor bya ba'o //
T02D1711:73b-23: phyugs dag bsad nas g-yos byas lha bshos bzhin //
T02D1711:73b-24: rnal 'byor ma grogs bzang dang sgom pa po //
T02D1711:73b-25: rtag tu bza' dang bza' min de bzhin du //
T02D1711:73b-26: btung dang btung min bgrod bya bgrod min spyod //
T02D1711:73b-27: rnal 'byor ma tshogs dkyil 'khor 'di dag ni //
T02D1711:73b-28: sdig pas ma gos mnyam nyid brtan pa'i chos //
T02D1711:73b-29: rnal 'byor gong ma rnal 'byor ster gsang ba //
T02D1711:73b-30: shin tu gsang ba 'og ma'i gong ma 'di //
T02D1711:73b-31: sba zhing mi brjod skye ba 'di la 'grub //
T02D1711:73b-32: dge ba bcu dang tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi ldan //
T02D1711:73b-33: sbyin sogs mang po gtong ba'i snying stobs can //
T02D1711:73b-34: mchog dang mchog min gong du bsgom //
T02D1711:73b-35: ji ltar rigs kyi rim par son pa yi //
T02D1711:73b-36: gang la mos pa sna tshogs rnal 'byor ma //
T02D1711:73b-37: ri dags gdan can sna tshogs pad nyi la //
T02D1711:74a-0: bdag nyid rje btsun sgrol ma'i @74a * //
T02D1711:74a-2: sna tshogs mdog can zhabs bzhi ba rkyang bskum du //
T02D1711:74a-3: yang dag brtan bzhugs ljang gu ser po dang //
T02D1711:74a-4: dmar po steng zhal g-yon dkar mche gtsigs zhal //
T02D1711:74a-5: thod pa zhal gyi steng gnas don grub kyi //
T02D1711:74a-6: dbu rgyan mi rus rgyan 'dzin skra grol ba //
T02D1711:74a-7: spyan gsum dmar bas mdzes pa'i gzugs can la //
T02D1711:74a-8: ral gri rdo rje gsor ba 'khor lo dang //
T02D1711:74a-9: lcags kyu dril bu snying gar sdigs mdzub 'chang //
T02D1711:74a-10: gri gug mi mgo mchog tu autpala thod //
T02D1711:74a-11: khatv'am ga 'dzin tshangs pa'i pags steng g-yogs //
T02D1711:74a-12: dbang phyug chen po khyab 'dug gi steng du //
T02D1711:74a-13: zhabs kyi padmar bzhugs shing thugs 'khrug pa //
T02D1711:74a-14: sngon du brjod pa'i dkyil 'khor dbus na bzhugs //
T02D1711:74a-15: rnal 'byor ma tshogs thams cad sna tshogs mdog / phyogs kyi gos 'dzin gsang ba sbas pa yis //
T02D1711:74a-16: gang gi dpal ldan rnal 'byor byang phyogs kyi //
T02D1711:74a-17: rim pa'i rim pa gong ma'i rnal 'byor mchog / brgyud pa'i rim pa thams cad bla na med //
T02D1711:74a-18: bsam gtan rnal 'byor ma snying bla na med //
T02D1711:74a-19: 'dis ni bzang po'i las rnams thams cad byed //
T02D1711:74a-20: sbyangs pas sdig spyod spros med bsgom par bya ;
T02D1711:74a-21: / gang zhig rnal 'byor gang gis sa 'og dang //
T02D1711:74a-22: sa steng sa bla ma lus phyi nang kun //
T02D1711:74a-23: lus kyi zhing gi ngo bo'i bdag nyid ni //
T02D1711:74a-24: gnas su ji ltar bde bar snying gar h'um //
T02D1711:74a-25: dpral steng aom dang spyi bor ham mig tu //
T02D1711:74a-26: h'um dgod lus kun ham phat yan lag kun //
T02D1711:74a-27: lus kyi zhing gi ngo bo'i bdag nyid ni //
T02D1711:74a-28: mda' spro he ho hi ham phat //
T02D1711:74a-29: snying ga dpral ba spyi bo mig lus kun //
T02D1711:74a-30: yan lag thams cad yan lag drug lus la //
T02D1711:74a-31: cho ga rim bzhin 'gro ba'i rim par dgod //
T02D1711:74a-32: yi dam lha yi ngo bo'i bdag nyid du //
T02D1711:74a-33: 'gro ba thams cad bltas te srid pa las //
T02D1711:74a-34: sgrol ba'i sgrol ma'i bzlas bsgom de mchog yin //
T02D1711:74a-35: dur khrod shing gcig ri khrod gnas gzhi phug / mchod rten mtha' 'khob rnal 'byor ma yi gnas //
T02D1711:74a-36: smad 'tshong ma gnas lam dang rgyal po'i grong //
T02D1711:74a-37: chu 'gram chen po'i drung dang rtags gcig pa //
T02D1711:74b-0: dbang @74b phyug che gnas rdzing bu lteng ka'am //
T02D1711:74b-1: 'jig rten mkha' 'gro ma yi gnas sam gang rung du //
T02D1711:74b-2: brtson pas gcig tu grogs med ngo bo'i bdag nyid du //
T02D1711:74b-3: yid dga' rnal 'byor brgyud pa zhing brgyud rigs brgyud pa'i //
T02D1711:74b-4: rnal 'byor ma yi bdag mo shin tu za //
T02D1711:74b-5: 'khor lo brgyud pa ye shes brgyud pa bsgom //
T02D1711:74b-6: rim par brgyud pa bla ma'i rim brgyud pa //
T02D1711:74b-7: mi phyed byang sems ngo bo brtan pa 'di //
T02D1711:74b-8: legs par mi phyed nges pa'i shes pa yi //
T02D1711:74b-9: mi bden yul chos rnam par rtog pa spangs //
T02D1711:74b-10: lus ngag yid kyi rgyud las bsgom 'grub pa //
T02D1711:74b-11: spyi bo'i steng du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi //
T02D1711:74b-12: steng na bdud rtsi lnga 'bab yang dag 'phro //
T02D1711:74b-13: gang zhig brtan pas aom yig bsgom par bya //
T02D1711:74b-14: mi phyed byas pa ji ltar rnal 'byor gyis //
T02D1711:74b-15: steng nas 'bab pa 'byung bar byed pa yi //
T02D1711:74b-16: 'di yi rnal 'byor ma yi rnal 'byor gyis //
T02D1711:74b-17: rang gi ngo bo gzi brjid bcas pa dang ;
T02D1711:74b-18: / kun nas sdug bsngal thams cad rnam spangs shing //
T02D1711:74b-19: mchod gnas chen po rje btsun sgrol ma'i sku //
T02D1711:74b-20: bsam gtan de kho na nyid don phyug pa'i //
T02D1711:74b-21: dpal ldan rdo rje sems dpas gang gsungs pa'i //
T02D1711:74b-22: mchu la bam yig dag gi lam gyi lce la aa bzhag ste //
T02D1711:74b-23: yid bzhin nor bu 'di mchog sdug bsngal thams cad 'phrog cing zhi //
T02D1711:74b-24: ye shes de nyid rang bzhin mthong ba 'di //
T02D1711:74b-25: gang zhig 'di bsgom rnal 'byor byang chub sems dpa' yi //
T02D1711:74b-26: grags pa chen pos zhi gsum 'grub par shog / lha mo sgrol ma'i rang bzhin rnal 'byor ldan //
T02D1711:74b-27: rdo rje gsang ba'i rgyud du sgrol ma yi //
T02D1711:74b-28: sgrub thabs gong du bris pa rdo rje'i tshig / sems can ye shes thob byed gang yin 'di //
T02D1711:74b-29: ma dad pa'am ma sbyin bya ba ngan pa dang //
T02D1711:74b-30: chags can khro ba can min slob min bu la min //
T02D1711:74b-31: sdug bsngal blo can la min slob dpon gyis ;
T02D1711:74b-32: / gzhan la sgrub thabs 'di sbyin byang phyogs kyi //
T02D1711:74b-33: au rgyan nas 'ong bram ze'i gnas kyi nang //
T02D1711:74b-34: zhing gi bu ma'i rnal 'byor ma tshogs rdo rje'i tshig de grub //
T02D1711:74b-35: bcom ldan 'das ma lha mo sgrol ma au rgyan gyi rim pa'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so /
T02D1711:75a-0: // / @75a * // mkha' 'gro ma rdo rje ldan mas gsungs pa'o //
T02D1711:75a-1: mah'a a'a tsarya ratna shr'i'i slob ma pandi ta pa ra he ta dang /
